name: Dream JackPot
description:
Pack your bags and go to Las Vegas!
Try to win the JackPot and become a millionaire!

You start the game with $500 in your pocket.
With that, try to explode the Bank!

Your earnings are permanently stored.

Enjoy!

••• Game Features •••

• Optimized for iPhone 5
• Easy to play
• Play with no risk
• Try to win the JackPot!
• Welcome to Las Vegas!
